name: restaurant
description: This is a website for the fictional Restaurant

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
scripts.usemin: usemin menu.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/menu.html && usemin beer.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/beer.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin cart.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/cart.html && usemin Contact.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/Contact.html && usemin events.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/events.html

author: Travis Willey
